latex:
Let $a$, $b$, $c$, $d$, and $e$ be real numbers satisfying the system of equations
    \begin{align*}
        a+b+c+d+e = 7, \\ 
        ab+ac+ad+ae+bc+bd+be+cd+ce+de = -4, \\ 
        abc+abd+abe+acd+ace+ade+bcd+bce+bde+cde = -28, \\ 
        abcd+abce+abde+acde+bcde = 1, \\ 
        abcde = 7.
    \end{align*}
    What is the value of the largest of the $5$ variables?
